title: One Way Heroics

notes:
The game needs the files "gm16.dls" and "gm.dls", these must go in "steamapps/compatdata/266210/pfx/drive_c/windows/syswow64/drivers". 

You also need to install "directmusic" and "dsdmo" via winetricks/protontricks. If the game fails to start (blackscreen), set "sound=alsa" as well. 

This also fixes the dead process on exit, the game now closes gracefully. 

* Without doing these steps, you might experience the same problems as in the rest of the reports.
title: One Way Heroics
